entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
